design_philosophy.name: Calm Focus (Opal Dark)
design_philosophy.description: A quiet, intentional, and trustworthy aesthetic inspired by the Opal app. It minimizes visual noise to create a sense of confidence and flow.
core_principles: Deep Focus: Use deep charcoal and dark blue tones, never pure black, to reduce eye strain.
Soft Light: Use subtle gradients and inner glows to simulate light hitting a matte surface.
Intentional Spacing: 3x standard spacing. The interface should feel 'breathable'.
No Clutter: Only show what is necessary. One action at a time.

backgroundImage.glow-gradient: radial-gradient(circle at top center, rgba(129, 140, 248, 0.08), transparent 40%)

layout_structure.container: max-w-2xl mx-auto px-6 py-12 md:py-20 min-h-screen flex flex-col

Hero.specs: Center aligned. Minimalist. Title + Subtitle + Soft glow background.

FileUpload.specs: Large drop zone. Dashed border (opacity 20%). Hover state increases border opacity and glows.
FileUpload.classes: border-2 border-dashed border-white/10 hover:border-opal-primary/50 hover:bg-white/5 transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl p-10 text-center cursor-pointer group

JobInput.specs: Textarea with glass background. No heavy borders. Focus ring is a soft glow.
JobInput.classes: bg-white/5 border-white/5 focus:border-opal-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-opal-primary/50 rounded-xl p-6 text-base text-slate-200 placeholder:text-slate-500 resize-y min-h-[200px]

GenerateButton.specs: Full width. Pill shape or slightly rounded. Subtle shimmer animation. Gradient background.
GenerateButton.classes: w-full py-4 rounded-xl bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-500 text-white font-semibold text-lg shadow-neon transition-all duration-300 active:scale-[0.98]

ResultsTabs.specs: Shadcn Tabs component. Custom styling: Minimal underline or pill indicator. Content area has soft glass background.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-300 or lighter on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (blue-500/50) for all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Only: Force dark mode classes.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid for readability.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl sparingly (only on sticky headers or overlays).
Data Test IDs: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the 'opal' colors and font families.
2. Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
3. Set the body background to bg-opal-bg and text to text-slate-300.
4. Create the single-page layout in App.js (or create a new Home component).
6. Ensure the 'Generate' flow feels magical (use a loading state with a pulse effect).
7. Mock the backend API calls for V1 if the backend isn't ready, but structure the code to swap in the real API easily.
